snippet.title: Pencil - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description:
Join Leo and learn how to draw in Pencil, a VR game that is coming to the App Lab for Meta Quest 3. Watch the trailer for Pencil to see drawing tutorials and the free draw mode in action. 


Please Note: The Pencil launch on App Lab was delayed. A demo is available now at https://pencil-xr.com/discord/
